default.title: Sorry, something went wrong
default.message: A server exception occurred. Please try again.

session.title: Sorry, you'll have to start again
session.message: You haven't entered any details for 60 minutes, so we have cleared your information to keep it secure.

404.title: The page or item you were looking for has not been found
404.description: Please check that you have entered the correct web address, or explore GOV.UK to find the information you need.

cookies-required.title: Cookies are required to use this service
cookies-required.message:
Cookies are required in order to use the BRP service.

Please enable cookies and try again. Find out how to we use cookies.
